column5: NDRA i feel blessed to only be down 20 here hopefully the market will stabilize tomorrow After the last couple days i think odds of a green Friday are good Fingers crossed knock on wood
NDRA Somebody shaking that tree but not filling up my long Went as low as 102 but no fills for me at 104
Everyday in my portfolio there are losers outdoing each other for biggest drop Today it is NDRA cover eyes in horror
NDRA I have done my DD on this stock just sucks to see the current position I am confident I come out ahead here Paytience
NDRA someone go buy the rest of my shares if youre so confident in upside

NDRA I know I keep saying it but it is worth repeating if you believe in this product and are long warrants are the best bang for your buck If in two years this is at 30 warrants will be worth 2375 30 minus 625 You can get like 25 warrants for every common share
NDRA with this US situation China the best thing to do is invest in ndra European and US market to occupy with a technology that nobody owns in a sector in sure growth
